amendment.description: To require a report on the Department of Defense Composite Health Care System II.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1362 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1362 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Obama. (consideration: CR S12497-12513) To require a report on the Department of Defense Composite Health Care System II.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1362 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1362 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Obama.
